>
[Ubiquitous Snares](/Feats.aspx?ID=539) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 177 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Snare Specialist](/Feats.aspx?ID=506)

</column>

---

You can prepare a seemingly impossible number of snares in advance, and you’re ready to spring them on unsuspecting foes. Double the number of prepared snares from Snare Specialist.

<title level="2">Ubiquitous Snares leads to...</title>
[Impossible Snares](/Feats.aspx?ID=1779)
name: Ubiquitous Snares
